title: 我在那里过得很愉快，并且注意到英式生活中一些有趣的事情。
answer: I enjoyed my stay, and I noticed something interesting with the English way of life.

title: 比如，初次与某人见面时，你必须称呼先生或女士。
answer: For example, you must say Mr or Mrs when you meet someone for the first time.

title: 下午茶不仅仅是喝茶，而且是下午4点左右的一顿便餐。
answer: Afternoon tea is not just a drink but a light meal at around 4 pm.

title: 有一天，我们去拜访了一些朋友，并且一起喝了下午茶。
answer: One day, we visited some friends and had afternoon tea together.

title: 有一次我看到一位先生拍了拍一位年轻人的肩膀……
answer: Once l noticed a gentleman touch a young man on the shoulder…

title: 在英国,你们可以在 17岁时开车吗?
answer: Can you drive a car at the age of seventeenin England?
